* [Geo-institute](https://www.geoinstitute.org/), American Society of Civil Engineers 
* National Science Foundation Engineering Research Center for Bio-mediated and Bio-inspired Geotechnics, [EEC-1449501](https://www.nsf.gov/awardsearch/showAward?AWD_ID=1449501)
